text: ivarkaḷ allāhvait tavirttu taṅkaḷ pātirikaḷaiyum, canniyācikaḷaiyum, maryamuṭaiya makaṉ masīhaiyum, (taṅkaḷ) kaṭavuḷkaḷāka eṭuttuk koṇṭirukkiṉṟaṉar. Eṉiṉum, vaṇakkattiṟkuriya orē ōr iṟaivaṉait tavira maṟṟevaraiyum vaṇaṅkak kūṭāteṉṟē ivarkaḷ aṉaivarum ēvappaṭṭu irukkiṉṟaṉar. Vaṇakkattiṟkuriya iṟaivaṉ avaṉait tavira (vēṟevaṉum) illai. Avarkaḷ iṇaivaikkum ivaṟṟaiviṭṭu avaṉ mikavum paricuttamāṉavaṉ
